products.name: Nike Men's Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in Black, Size: 8.5 | FJ2572-002
products.brandedName: Nike Men's Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in Black, Size: 8.5 | FJ2572-002
products.unbrandedName: Men's Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in Black, Size: 8.5 | FJ2572-002
products.description: Obsessed with perfecting your craft? We made this for you. In the middle of the storm, with chaos swirling all around you, you've calmly found the final third of the field, thanks to your uncanny mix of on-ball guile and grace. Go finish the job in the Phantom Luna 2 Elite. Revolutionary Nike Gripknit covers the striking area of the cleat while Nike Cyclone 360 traction helps guide your unscripted agility. We design Elite cleats for you and the world's biggest stars to give you high-level quality, because you demand greatness from yourself and your footwear. Exceptional Touch:Nike Gripknit is a sticky material that provides exceptional touch to the ball. It covers the striking area of the cleat, stretching from the big-toe side all the way across the laces to the pinky toe, allowing clean boot-to-ball kicks. It molds to the shape of your foot and gives you great grip in wet or dry conditions. Micro-molding texture works with Gripknit to help form to your foot for even better cleat-to-ball strikes. Quick Traction:Nike Cyclone 360 traction pattern helps you make quicker (improved agility when making cuts) and confident (helps reduce rotational traction) movements, so you can cut with speed while feeling fully secure when the game's intensity turns up. Snug Fit:Asymmetric lacing offers a large touch surface when dribbling, passing and scoring. A repositioned lacing pattern allows for increased midfoot adjustability to accommodate players with flatter or higher arches. Asymmetrical Flyknit cuff material provides snugness and shape around your ankle. Subtle ribs in the cuff allow for ball contact higher up the ankle in trapping and passing. Product Details:For use on slightly wet, short-grass fields. Cushioned insole. Style: FJ2572; Color: Black/Deep Jungle/Black; Size: 8.5; Gender: Male; Age Group: Adult | Nike Phantom Luna 2 Elite FG High-Top Soccer Cleats in Black, Size: 8.5 | FJ2572-002

products.name: Suede Belt, , Navy - Blue
products.brandedName: Ferragamo Suede Belt, , Navy - Blue
products.description: Elegance resides in simplicity – such is the essence of the navy belt by renowned designer FERRAGAMO. Crafted from the finest leather, reminiscent of soft suede in its texture, this accessory epitomizes luxury without the need for superfluous embellishments. Its dominant, deep shade of navy adds a layer of versatility, making it a perfect complement to both formal and casual ensembles. At the heart of this refined accessory is a metallic buckle with a matte finish, adorned with the FERRAGAMO logo. The artistically intertwined letters not only serve as a functional clasp but also as a distinctive brand hallmark. The contrast between the matte buckle and the textured surface of the belt accentuates its exclusive nature. Adjustable holes at the back ensure a perfect fit to the silhouette, offering wearing comfort. WHY INVEST IN THIS PRODUCT? * Crafted from 100% PREMIUM QUALITY LEATHER, ensuring durability and resilience. * An exclusive buckle featuring the FERRAGAMO logo, synonymous with luxury and unique style. * A versatile, navy color that easily blends with a variety of wardrobe elements. * A minimalist design that accentuates elegance without the clutter of decorations. * Adjustability feature, allowing the belt to perfectly contour any silhouette.

products.brandedName: Hoka One One Men's Bondi 8 (Lime Glow/Lemonade) Men's Shoes
products.description: For information on how HOKA ONE ONE contributes to the community, please visit the page. ; ; APMA Approved: The American Podiatric Medical Association Seal of Acceptance is awarded to products that promote good foot health and are substantiated by a committee of discerning podiatrists by wear-testing and review of the application and supporting documentation. APMA Acceptance must be applied for and is not automatically available to styles that meet its criteria. One of the hardest working shoes in the HOKA lineup, the Bondi takes a bold step forward this season reworked with softer, lighter foams and a brand-new extended heel geometry. Taking on a billowed effect, the rear crash pad affords an incredibly soft and balanced ride from heel strike to forefoot transaction. Best for everyday run, walking, comfort. Cover the trails wearing the Hoka Men's Bondi 8 sneakers. Textile and synthetic upper. Textile lining and insole. MATRYX upper features high-tensile synthetic fiber strands across the midfoot for enhanced durability and strength at minimal weight. Pull-on tab on heel notch. Hoka One One Bucket Seat Midsole provides integrated stability within the shoe and adapts to a wide range of feet and running styles. Vibram MegaGrip Hi-Traction outsole features 5mm lugs for exceptional grip and traction over rough terrain. Lace-up closure. Round toe. Heel-to-Toe Drop: 4mm Synthetic sole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 11 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size.

products.description: Creative Director Jonathan Anderson captures the carefree aesthetic of island life in his lively collection for LOEWE. Inspired by Paula's, Armin Heinemann's legendary Spanish boutique, the design visionary presents original archive prints, dynamic fabrics, and laid-back silhouettes. This camp shirt features a checkered pattern, repeating logo print, and chest patch pocket. Crafted of a soft cotton blend, this button-front design includes drop shoulders for a relaxed fit.
